title: A Dynamic Agent Based Model of the Real Economy with Monopolistic Competition, Perfect Product Differentiation, Heterogeneous Agents, Increasing Returns to Scale and Trade in Disequilibrium. (arXiv:2401.07070v1 [econ.TH])
abstract: We have used agent-based modeling as our numerical method to artificially simulate a dynamic real economy where agents are rational maximizers of an objective function of Cobb-Douglas type. The economy is characterised by heterogeneous agents, acting out of local or imperfect information, monopolistic competition, perfect product differentiation, allowance for increasing returns to scale technology and trade in disequilibrium. An algorithm for economic activity in each period is devised and a general purpose open source agent-based model is developed which allows for counterfactual inquiries, testing out treatments, analysing causality of various economic processes, outcomes and studying emergent properties. 10,000 simulations, with 10 firms and 80 consumers are run with varying parameters and the results show that from only a few initial conditions the economy reaches equilibrium while in most of the other cases it remains in perpetual disequilibrium. translated_title: 具有垄断竞争、完全产品差异化、异质代理人、规模报酬递增和非均衡贸易的实体经济的动态代理模型
translated_abstract: 我们使用基于代理的建模作为数值方法，人为地模拟了一个动态的实体经济，其中代理人是柯布-道格拉斯类型目标函数的理性最优化者。该经济的特点是异质代理人、在局部或不完全信息下行动、垄断竞争、完全产品差异化、允许规模报酬递增技术和非均衡贸易。我们设计了每个时期的经济活动算法，并开发了一个通用的开源代理模型，可以进行反事实查询、测试处理方法、分析各种经济过程、结果的因果关系，并研究 emergent properties。我们运行了10,000次模拟，每次有10家公司和80个消费者，并根据不同的参数进行了测试。结果显示，仅从几个初始条件，经济就能达到均衡，而在大多数其他情况下，经济仍处于永久的非均衡状态。
tldr: 这是一个具有垄断竞争、完全产品差异化、异质代理人、规模报酬递增和非均衡贸易的实体经济的动态代理模型，通过agent-based modeling模拟，并验证了经济的永久非均衡状态。
